00025 // Constructor
00026 BdkDDalitzKKPiAmp::BdkDDalitzKKPiAmp(const char * name, 
00027                                      const char * title, 
00028                                      BdkDalitzBase * pdf,
00029                                      Int_t componentsBit,
00030                                      Int_t defaultKstarSpin) :
00031   BdkAbsDDalitzAmp(name, title, pdf, componentsBit),

00044 Double_t BdkDDalitzKKPiAmp::efficiency(Double_t m12, Double_t m13) const
00045 {
00046 //      if(m12>1.0 && m13>1.0) return 0.0;
00047 //   Double_t m23 =  1.8645*1.8645+ 0.1349766*0.1349766 
00048 //     + 2.0*0.493677*0.493677 - m12 -m13;
00049 //   if(!(m23>1.0 && m23<1.2)) return 0.0;
00050 
00051   return 1.0;
00052 
00053   /*  
00054   //Here I set efficiency 
00055   Double_t c0 = -2.39917,
00056     s1 = 4.30997,
00057     s2 = -2.35996,
00058     s3 = 0.431582,
00059     s4 = 0.421878,
00060     s5 = -2.07148,
00061     Normalization = 60.03,
00062     value = Normalization*(c0 + s1*(m12+m13) + s2*(m12*m12+m13*m13) + 
00063                            s3*(m13*m13*m13+m12*m12*m12) + 
00064                            s4*(m12*m12*m13+m12*m13*m13) + s5*m12*m13); 
00065   
00066   return value;
00067   */
00068   //  return _pdf->efficiency(m12, m13);
00069 }

00072 // initialize the components:
00073 void BdkDDalitzKKPiAmp::initResonance() 
00074 {
00075   if (nComps()!=0) {
00076     cout << "BdkDDalitzKKPiAmp::initResonance(): Cannot call initResonance more than once!" << endl;
00077     return;
00078   }
00079     
00080   // Define all RooRealVar floating observables.
00081 
00082   /* The trackinfo variable defines the cyclycal nature of the resonances
00083      and the final state pions, with the following order. 
00084      See enum ResDaughters.
00085 
00086      index   particle
00087      1       pi0
00088      2       K+
00089      3       K-
00090      --------------
00091      index   resonance   dtr particles   dtr indices
00092      1       phi        K+ K-         23
00093      2       K*-        pi0 K-         13
00094      3       K*+        pi0 K+         12
00095   */
00096 
00097   int KstarIndex = -1;
00098   int Kstar1410PIndex = -1;
00099   int nonresIndex = -1;
00100 
00101   // K+pi0 resonances:
00102   if (KSTARP & componentsBit()) {
00103     KstarIndex = nComps();  // store its index
00104     addComp("K*+", 1.0, 0.0, 0.89166, 0.0508, PI0_PIP, _defaultKstarSpin);
00105   }
00106 
00107   if (KSTAR1410P & componentsBit()) {
00108     Kstar1410PIndex = nComps(); // store its index
00109     addComp("K*1410+", 1.0, 61.0, 1.414, 0.232, PI0_PIP, _defaultKstarSpin);
00110   }
00111 
00112   if (NONRESP & componentsBit()) {
00113     nonresIndex = nComps();  // store its index
00114     addComp("K+pi0_SW", 1.5, 120.0, 1.414, 0.290, PI0_PIP, SPIN0, -1, KPI_SW);
00115   }
00116 
00117   // K+K- resonances:
00118   if (PHI & componentsBit()) {
00119     addComp("Phi", 0.7, 43.0, 1.0195, 0.00426, PIP_PIM, SPIN1);
00120   }
00121 
00122   if (F2P1525 & componentsBit()) {
00123     addComp("F2P1525", 0.6, -40.0, 1.525, 0.073, PIP_PIM, SPIN2);
00124   }
00125 
00126   if (F0 & componentsBit()) {
00127     addComp("F0", 0.9, 170, 0.965, 0.044, PIP_PIM, SPIN0, -1, F0);
00128 
00129     // width for the F0 is taken from Flatte' formula and BES parameterization
00130     // which looked at J/psi-->phi pi+pi- and J/psi-->phi K+K-
00131   }
00132 
00133   if (A0 & componentsBit()) {
00134     addComp("A0", 0.9, 0, 0.998, 0.01, PIP_PIM, SPIN0, -1, A0);
00135   }
00136 
00137   // K-pi0 resonances:
00138   if (KSTARM & componentsBit()) {
00139     addComp("K*-", 0.67, -31.0, 0.89166, 0.0508, PIM_PI0, _defaultKstarSpin,
00140             KstarIndex);
00141   }
00142 
00143   if (KSTAR1410M & componentsBit()) {
00144     addComp("K*1410-", 1.0, 148.0, 1.414, 0.232, PIM_PI0, _defaultKstarSpin,
00145             Kstar1410PIndex);
00146   }
00147 
00148    if (NONRESM & componentsBit()) {
00149     addComp("K-pi0_SW", 1.5, -45.0, 1.414, 0.290, PIM_PI0, SPIN0,nonresIndex);
00150   }
00151  
00152 
00153   // Masses of the above daughters
00154   _mDaug[0] = 0.0;
00155   _mDaug[1] = BdkDalitz::PI0MASS;
00156   _mDaug[2] = BdkDalitz::KMASS;
00157   _mDaug[3] = BdkDalitz::KMASS;
00158 
00159 
00160   _r = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".r",
00161                               TString(GetTitle()) + " Effective Range",
00162                               3.32);
00163   _params.addOwned(*_r);
00164 
00165   _a = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".a",
00166                               TString(GetTitle()) + " Scattering Length",
00167                               2.07);
00168   _params.addOwned(*_a);
00169 
00170   _R = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".R",
00171                               TString(GetTitle()) + " Resonant Amplitude",
00172                               1.0);
00173   _params.addOwned(*_R);
00174 
00175   _B = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".B",
00176                               TString(GetTitle()) + " Background Amplitude",
00177                               1.0);
00178   _params.addOwned(*_B);
00179 
00180   _phiR = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".phiR",
00181                               TString(GetTitle()) + " Resonant Phase",
00182                               0.0);
00183   _params.addOwned(*_phiR);
00184 
00185   _phiB = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".phiB",
00186                               TString(GetTitle()) + " Background Phase",
00187                               0.0);
00188   _params.addOwned(*_phiB);
00189 
00190   _E791 = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".E791",
00191                               TString(GetTitle()) + " whether using E791 parameters",
00192                               0.0);
00193   _params.addOwned(*_E791);
00194 }

00197 
00198 RooComplex BdkDDalitzKKPiAmp::customME(Double_t m12, Double_t m13, Int_t i) const
00199 {
00200   Double_t s = kinematics(m12,m13,_trackinfo[i]);
00201   
00202   if (_typeRes[i]==A0RES)
00203     return a0Amp(s, _massRes[i]->getVal(), 0.105, 0.102); // this is a0(980)
00204   
00205   else if (_typeRes[i]==F0RES)
00206     return f0Amp(s, _massRes[i]->getVal(), 0.165, 0.165*4.21); // this is f0(980)
00207 
00208   else if (_typeRes[i]==KPI_SW) {
00209     /*********  LASS parameters:  return LASS(s, i);      *************/ 
00210     /*********  E791 parameters:  return E791Table(s);    *************/ 
00211     
00212     if(_E791->getVal()>0.0) return E791Table(s);
00213     else return LASS(s, i);
00214   }
00215 
00216   cout << GetName() <<".customME() not implemented for resonance type "
00217        << _typeRes[i] << endl;
00218   return RooComplex(0,0);  
00219 }

00224 //replace Breit-Wigner with LASS
00225 
00226 // RooComplex BdkDDalitzKKPiAmp::LASS(Double_t s, Int_t i) const 
00227 // {
00228 
00229 //   Double_t _mass = _massRes[i]->getVal();  //K*(1430) mass
00230 //   Double_t _width = _gammaRes[i]->getVal(); //K*(1430) width
00231 //   Double_t _m1=0.493677;       //This is K
00232 //   Double_t _m2=0.1349766;      //This is pi0 
00233     
00234 //   Double_t q      = pionCMmom(s, _m1, _m2);  //pion momentum in C.M. frame
00235 //   Double_t q0     = pionCMmom(_mass*_mass, _m1, _m2);  
00236 //   Double_t GammaM = _width * _mass/sqrt(s) * q/q0;  //mass dependent width
00237 
00238 
00239 //   //calculate the background phase motion
00240 //   Double_t cot_deltaB = 1.0/(_a->getVal()*q) + 0.5*_r->getVal()*q;
00241 //   Double_t _deltaB = atan( 1.0/cot_deltaB);
00242 //   Double_t totalB = (_deltaB + _phiB->getVal()*DEGTORAD) ;
00243   
00244 //   //calculate the resonant phase motion
00245 //   Double_t deltaR = atan((_mass*GammaM/(_mass*_mass - s)));
00246 //   Double_t totalR = deltaR + _phiR->getVal()*DEGTORAD;
00247   
00248 //   //sum them up
00249 //   RooComplex  bkgB,resT;
00250 //   bkgB = RooComplex(_B->getVal()*sin(totalB),0)*RooComplex(cos(totalB),sin(totalB));
00251 //   resT = RooComplex(_R->getVal()*sin(deltaR),0)*RooComplex(cos(totalR),sin(totalR))*
00252 //     RooComplex(cos(2*totalB),sin(2*totalB));
00253 //   RooComplex T = bkgB + resT;  
00254 //   T = T*RooComplex(sqrt(s)/q,0);  
00255 //   return T;
00256 // }
00257 
00258 
00259 RooComplex BdkDDalitzKKPiAmp::LASS(Double_t s, Int_t i) const
00260 {
00261   Double_t _resMass = _massRes[i]->getVal();   //K*(1430) mass
00262   Double_t _resWidth = _gammaRes[i]->getVal(); //K*(1430) width
00263   Int_t n = _trackinfo[i];
00264   Double_t _mDaugSum  = _mDaug[n] + _mDaug[1];
00265   Double_t _mDaugSumSq = _mDaugSum*_mDaugSum;
00266 
00267   Double_t _mDaugDiff = _mDaug[n] - _mDaug[1];
00268   Double_t _mDaugDiffSq = _mDaugDiff*_mDaugDiff;
00269 
00270   RooComplex resAmplitude = RooComplex(0.0, 0.0);
00271   RooComplex bkgAmplitude = RooComplex(0.0, 0.0);
00272   RooComplex totAmplitude = RooComplex(0.0, 0.0);
00273   
00274   if (s < 1e-10) {
00275     cout<<"Warning in LASS ::amplitude. Mass < 1e-10."<<endl;
00276     return RooComplex(0.0, 0.0);
00277   } else if (s > 2.2) {
00278     return RooComplex(0.0, 0.0);
00279   }
00280 
00281   //---------------------------
00282   // First do the resonant part
00283   //---------------------------
00284 
00285   // Calculate the width of the resonance (as a function of mass)
00286   // q is the momentum of either daughter in the resonance rest-frame
00287   Double_t q(0.0);
00288   if ((s - _mDaugSumSq)>0.0) { // protect against negative sqrt due to rounding errors
00289     q = sqrt((s - _mDaugSumSq)*(s - _mDaugDiffSq))/(2.0*sqrt(s));
00290   }
00291   Double_t _q0 = sqrt((_resMass*_resMass - _mDaugSumSq)*
00292            (_resMass*_resMass - _mDaugDiffSq))/(2.0*_resMass);
00293   Double_t qRatio = q/_q0;
00294 
00295   Double_t totWidth = _resWidth*qRatio*(_resMass/sqrt(s));
00296 
00297   Double_t massSqTerm = _resMass*_resMass - s;
00298 
00299   // Compute the complex amplitude
00300   resAmplitude = RooComplex(massSqTerm, _resMass*totWidth);
00301 
00302   // Scale by the denominator factor
00303   resAmplitude = resAmplitude*
00304     ((_resMass*_resMass*_resWidth/_q0)/(massSqTerm*massSqTerm +
00305                                  _resMass*_resMass*totWidth*totWidth));
00306 
00307   // Calculate the phase shift term
00308   Double_t deltaB = TMath::ATan((2.0*_a->getVal()*q)/
00309                                 (2.0 + _a->getVal()*_r->getVal()*q*q));
00310   Double_t cos2PhaseShift = TMath::Cos(2.0*(deltaB + _phiB->getVal()*DEGTORAD));
00311   Double_t sin2PhaseShift = TMath::Sin(2.0*(deltaB + _phiB->getVal()*DEGTORAD));
00312   RooComplex phaseShift = RooComplex(cos2PhaseShift, sin2PhaseShift);
00313 
00314   // Add in the R e^{i phiR} term
00315   Double_t reR = _R->getVal() * TMath::Cos(_phiR->getVal()*DEGTORAD);
00316   Double_t imR = _R->getVal() * TMath::Sin(_phiR->getVal()*DEGTORAD);
00317   RooComplex R = RooComplex(reR, imR);
00318 
00319   // Multiply by the phase shift and R e^{i phiR}
00320   resAmplitude = resAmplitude * phaseShift * R;
00321 
00322 
00323   //--------------------------------
00324   // Now do the effective range part
00325   //--------------------------------
00326 
00327   // Form the real and imaginary parts
00328   Double_t realTerm = q/TMath::Tan(deltaB + _phiB->getVal()*DEGTORAD);
00329   Double_t imagTerm = q;
00330 
00331   // Compute the complex amplitude
00332   bkgAmplitude = RooComplex(realTerm, imagTerm);
00333   bkgAmplitude = bkgAmplitude*(sqrt(s)*_B->getVal());
00334 
00335   // Scale by the denominator factor
00336   bkgAmplitude = bkgAmplitude*(1.0/(realTerm*realTerm 
00337                                     + imagTerm*imagTerm));
00338 
00339 
00340   //------------------
00341   // Add them together
00342   //------------------
00343 
00344   totAmplitude = bkgAmplitude + resAmplitude;
00345 
00346   return totAmplitude;
00347 }

00351 //replace Breit-Wigner with Brian's Table III (E791 MIPWA D+ --> Kpipi paper
00352 
00353 RooComplex BdkDDalitzKKPiAmp::E791Table(Double_t s) const 
00354 {
00355   if( sqrt(s)<0.672 || sqrt(s)>1.707 ) return RooComplex(0.0,0.0);
00356 
00357   double mass[38], FD[38], Amp[38], Phas[38];
00358   mass[0] = 0.672;        FD[0] = 0.26;       Amp[0] = 8.37;      Phas[0] = -102;
00359   mass[1] = 0.719;        FD[1] = 0.27;       Amp[1] = 9.04;      Phas[1] = -96;
00360   mass[2] = 0.764;        FD[2] = 0.29;       Amp[2] = 7.82;      Phas[2] = -73;
00361   mass[3] = 0.807;        FD[3] = 0.31;       Amp[3] = 7.42;      Phas[3] = -77;
00362   mass[4] = 0.847;        FD[4] = 0.33;       Amp[4] = 6.47;      Phas[4] = -60;
00363   mass[5] = 0.885;        FD[5] = 0.34;       Amp[5] = 5.57;      Phas[5] = -54;
00364   mass[6] = 0.922;        FD[6] = 0.36;       Amp[6] = 5.90;      Phas[6] = -68;
00365   mass[7] = 0.958;        FD[7] = 0.38;       Amp[7] = 6.17;      Phas[7] = -72;
00366   mass[8] = 0.992;        FD[8] = 0.40;       Amp[8] = 4.87;      Phas[8] = -41;
00367   mass[9] = 1.025;        FD[9] = 0.42;       Amp[9] = 4.42;      Phas[9] = -43;
00368   mass[10] = 1.057;       FD[10] = 0.44;      Amp[10] = 4.02;     Phas[10] = -38;
00369   mass[11] = 1.088;       FD[11] = 0.46;      Amp[11] = 3.74;     Phas[11] = -22;
00370   mass[12] = 1.118;       FD[12] = 0.49;      Amp[12] = 3.81;     Phas[12] = -29;
00371   mass[13] = 1.147;       FD[13] = 0.51;      Amp[13] = 3.16;     Phas[13] = -3;
00372   mass[14] = 1.176;       FD[14] = 0.53;      Amp[14] = 3.21;     Phas[14] = -11;
00373   mass[15] = 1.204;       FD[15] = 0.55;      Amp[15] = 2.86;     Phas[15] = -3;
00374   mass[16] = 1.231;       FD[16] = 0.58;      Amp[16] = 3.11;     Phas[16] = -3;
00375   mass[17] = 1.258;       FD[17] = 0.60;      Amp[17] = 2.92;     Phas[17] = 8;
00376   mass[18] = 1.284;       FD[18] = 0.62;      Amp[18] = 2.80;     Phas[18] = 11;
00377   mass[19] = 1.310;       FD[19] = 0.65;      Amp[19] = 2.77;     Phas[19] = 11;
00378   mass[20] = 1.335;       FD[20] = 0.67;      Amp[20] = 2.83;     Phas[20] = 22;
00379   mass[21] = 1.360;       FD[21] = 0.69;      Amp[21] = 2.73;     Phas[21] = 31;
00380   mass[22] = 1.384;       FD[22] = 0.71;      Amp[22] = 2.29;     Phas[22] = 30;
00381   mass[23] = 1.408;       FD[23] = 0.74;      Amp[23] = 2.38;     Phas[23] = 46;
00382   mass[24] = 1.431;       FD[24] = 0.76;      Amp[24] = 2.05;     Phas[24] = 55;
00383   mass[25] = 1.454;       FD[25] = 0.78;      Amp[25] = 1.59;     Phas[25] = 64;
00384   mass[26] = 1.477;       FD[26] = 0.80;      Amp[26] = 1.33;     Phas[26] = 80;
00385   mass[27] = 1.499;       FD[27] = 0.82;      Amp[27] = 1.23;     Phas[27] = 74;
00386   mass[28] = 1.522;       FD[28] = 0.84;      Amp[28] = 0.66;     Phas[28] = 34;
00387   mass[29] = 1.543;       FD[29] = 0.86;      Amp[29] = 0.57;     Phas[29] = 18;
00388   mass[30] = 1.565;       FD[30] = 0.88;      Amp[30] = 0.50;     Phas[30] = 22;
00389   mass[31] = 1.586;       FD[31] = 0.90;      Amp[31] = 1.18;     Phas[31] = 10;
00390   mass[32] = 1.607;       FD[32] = 0.92;      Amp[32] = 1.35;     Phas[32] = 11;
00391   mass[33] = 1.627;       FD[33] = 0.93;      Amp[33] = 1.11;     Phas[33] = 19;
00392   mass[34] = 1.648;       FD[34] = 0.95;      Amp[34] = 1.37;     Phas[34] = 2;
00393   mass[35] = 1.668;       FD[35] = 0.96;      Amp[35] = 1.82;     Phas[35] = 28;
00394   mass[36] = 1.687;       FD[36] = 0.98;      Amp[36] = 1.16;     Phas[36] = 8;
00395   mass[37] = 1.707;       FD[37] = 0.99;      Amp[37] = 1.47;     Phas[37] = 11;
00396 
00397 
00398   int n = 0;
00399   for(int i=0; i<36; i++) { if( sqrt(s)>mass[i] && sqrt(s)<mass[i+1] ) n = i; }
00400   
00401 
00402   double slope = (sqrt(s)-mass[n])/(mass[n+1]-mass[n]);
00403   double ReLo = FD[n]*Amp[n]*cos(Phas[n]*DEGTORAD);
00404   double ImLo = FD[n]*Amp[n]*sin(Phas[n]*DEGTORAD);
00405   double ReDiff = FD[n+1]*Amp[n+1]*cos(Phas[n+1]*DEGTORAD) - ReLo;
00406   double ImDiff = FD[n+1]*Amp[n+1]*sin(Phas[n+1]*DEGTORAD) - ImLo;
00407   RooComplex loV = RooComplex(ReLo, ImLo);
00408   RooComplex diff = RooComplex(ReDiff, ImDiff)*slope;
00409 
00410 
00411   RooComplex val = loV + diff;
00412 
00413   return val;
00414 }
